alert.note: Alert for Codington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 14 at 7:31PM MDT until April 16 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Dakota... Big Sioux River at Watertown Broadway Avenue affecting Codington County. Big Sioux River Near Watertown affecting Codington County. Big Sioux River Above Lake Kampeska affecting Codington County. Big Sioux River at Watertown Sioux Conifer Road affecting Codington County. Big Sioux River Near Florence affecting Grant County. Big Sioux River Near Castlewood affecting Hamlin County. .Warm temperatures will melt snowpack and increase river flows. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Sioux River Near Watertown. * WHEN...Until Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 11.5 feet, Significant amounts of pasture and crop land are flooded * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Friday the stage was 10.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 PM CDT Friday was 11.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Sunday morning and continue falling to 8.3 feet Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/abr. The next statement will be issued late Saturday night by 430 AM CDT.
